message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we meet closer to the middle? This is my counter-offer.
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Alice, we're getting close, but this needs to be more beneficial for me to agree. Time is literally money for us in this game, let's close this deal.
